creator: gopal.govindakrishnan@sun.com
text:
When I create a table with borders for each row, the row borders are not
rendered at all.

I am using version fop 0.20.2RC ...

OR is there any other way that I can create a table with grids?

creator: corinna@infix.de
text:
The border properties for rows are not implemented yet.

You can create your grid with column borders all around and uppper/lower cell 
borders.

Corinna
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 2475 ***
